spimalot 0.5.28
  • Reference

Create summaries

Source: R/combined_spim.R
spim_summary.Rd

Create summaries

spim_summary_nowcast(dat, sircovid_model = "carehomes")

spim_summary_time_series(dat, time_series_date, sircovid_model = "carehomes")

spim_summary_write(result, path_template, path_save)

Arguments

dat

A combined data object (loaded by spim_combined_load

sircovid_model

The name of the sircovid model used. Default is "carehomes"

time_series_date

The start date for the preceding time series

result

Result of spim_summary_nowcast or spim_summary_time_series

path_template

Path to the template file

path_save

Path to save the result at

Value

A data.frame of results

Contents
